00037 
00038 Entree& Reorienter_triangles::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00039 {
00040   Cerr << "Reorientation of triangles for either direct..." << finl;
00041   if (dimension != 2)
00042     {
00043       Cerr << "we can not reorientate (Reorienter) triangles in dimension " << dimension <<finl;
00044       exit();
00045     }
00046   Nom nom_dom, typ_zone;
00047   associer_domaine(is);
00048   Domaine& dom=domaine();
00049   Scatter::uninit_sequential_domain(dom);
00050   Reorienter(dom);
00051   Scatter::init_sequential_domain(dom);
00052   Cerr << "Reorientation of triangles... OK" << finl;
00053   return is;
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 Reorienter_triangles::Sens Reorienter_triangles::test_orientation_triangle(IntTab& les_elems, int num_element, const DoubleTab& coord_sommets) const
00058 {
00059   static const int SOM_Z = 0;
00060   static const int SOM_A = 1;
00061   static const int SOM_B = 2;
00062 
00063   const int som_Z = les_elems(num_element,SOM_Z);
00064   const int som_A = les_elems(num_element,SOM_A);
00065   const int som_B = les_elems(num_element,SOM_B);
00066 
00067   double ZA0 = coord_sommets(som_A,0) - coord_sommets(som_Z,0);
00068   double ZB0 = coord_sommets(som_B,0) - coord_sommets(som_Z,0);
00069   double ZA1 = coord_sommets(som_A,1) - coord_sommets(som_Z,1);
00070   double ZB1 = coord_sommets(som_B,1) - coord_sommets(som_Z,1);
00071 
00072 // calcul pdt vect ZAxZB
00073   double pdtvect = ZA0*ZB1 - ZA1*ZB0;
00074 
00075   if (pdtvect<0.)
00076     {
00077 // le pdt scalaire est negatif : il s'agit d'un triangle mal oriente
00078 #ifdef _AFFDEBUG
00079       {
00080         Process::Journal<<"  element "<<num_element<<"  indirect"<<finl;
00081       }
00082 #endif
00083       return INDIRECT;
00084     }
00085 #ifdef _AFFDEBUG
00086   {
00087     Process::Journal<<"  element "<<num_element<<"  direct"<<finl;
00088   }
00089 #endif
00090 
00091   return DIRECT;
00092 }
00093 
00094 Reorienter_triangles::Sens Reorienter_triangles::reorienter_triangle(IntTab& les_elems, int num_element) const
00095 {
00096   static const int SOM_A = 1;
00097   static const int SOM_B = 2;
00098 
00099 // pour reorienter le triangle, on va permuter les sommets 1 et 2
00100   int tmp;
00101   tmp = les_elems(num_element,SOM_A);
00102   les_elems(num_element,SOM_A) = les_elems(num_element,SOM_B);
00103   les_elems(num_element,SOM_B) = tmp;
00104   return DIRECT;
00105 }
00106 
00107 // Cette methode permet de reorienter les triangles dans le sens direct
00108 void Reorienter_triangles::Reorienter(Domaine& dom) const
00109 {
00110   const DoubleTab& coord_sommets = dom.coord_sommets();
00111   int nb_zones = dom.nb_zones();
00112   int iz;
00113 
00114 // on balaye les zones du domaine
00115   for(iz=0 ; iz<nb_zones ; iz++)
00116     {
00117       Zone& zone = dom.zone(iz);
00118       if (zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() == "Triangle" )
00119         {
00120 // zone de triangles
00121           IntTab& les_elems = zone.les_elems();
00122           int nb_elems = les_elems.dimension(0);
00123           int ielem;
00124 
00125 // balaye les triangles
00126           for (ielem=0 ; ielem<nb_elems ; ielem++)
00127             {
00128               if (test_orientation_triangle(les_elems, ielem, coord_sommets)==INDIRECT)
00129                 {
00130 // triangle oriente en sens indirect -> a reorienter
00131                   reorienter_triangle(les_elems, ielem);
00132 
00133 #ifdef _AFFDEBUG
00134                   {
00135                     Process::Journal<<"  #element reoriente "<<ielem<<finl;
00136                     static const int SOM_Z = 0;
00137                     static const int SOM_A = 1;
00138                     static const int SOM_B = 2;
00139                     const int som_Z = les_elems(ielem,SOM_Z);
00140                     const int som_A = les_elems(ielem,SOM_A);
00141                     const int som_B = les_elems(ielem,SOM_B);
00142                     Process::Journal<<"    somZ= "<<som_Z<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_Z, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_Z, 1)<<finl;
00143                     Process::Journal<<"    somA= "<<som_A<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_A, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_A, 1)<<finl;
00144                     Process::Journal<<"    somB= "<<som_B<<"  coords= "<<coord_sommets(som_B, 0)<<" "<<coord_sommets(som_B, 1)<<finl;
00145                   }
00146 #endif
00147                 }
00148             }
00149         }
00150     }//fin balayage zones
00151 }
